name: Tim & Tom
description:
Tim and Tom are the main characters in this game. Tim is controlled with the keyboard and Tom is controlled with a controller. In this game you must complete the level as fast as possible by solving puzzles featuring buttons, knobs, switches, pistons, doors, spikes, circlesaws, which require cooperation and basic logic. In total there are 62 tiles you can use!

THIS GAME IS MADE TO PLAY WITH FRIENDS!

This game has a level editor to make your own levels.
